io.craigmiller160.stockmarket.gui

Class PortfolioPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.craigmiller160.mvp.listener.AbstractListenerView
      • io.craigmiller160.stockmarket.gui.PortfolioPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.craigmiller160.mvp.core.PropertyChangeView, io.craigmiller160.mvp.listener.ListenerView, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    @NotThreadSafe
public class PortfolioPanel
extends io.craigmiller160.mvp.listener.AbstractListenerView
    The panel containing the stock portfolio. The portfolio is represented by a list of all the stocks it contains.

    Like all GUI classes in this program, this class separates its instantiation code from its assembly code for maximum flexibility.

    THREAD SAFETY: Swing is NOT thread safe.

    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    craig
